title: Hook
summaries: The Hook is a crafting material used solely to craft the Grappling Hook. It has a 4*1/25 (4%) chance to drop from Skeletons, Undead Miners, Hoplites, and Undead Vikings in the Marble Caves, Ice biome, and Cavern layer. It also has a 3.33*1/30 (3.33%) chance to drop from Piranhas in the Jungle, Underground Jungle, Cavern, and Underground layer.

statistics.Tooltip: Sometimes dropped by Skeletons and Piranha
statistics.Sell: 2
